info.title: PolicyClient
info.description: To manage and control access to your resources, you can define customized policies and assign them at a scope.

get.description: This operation retrieves a list of all the built-in policy set definitions.

parameters.name: api-version
parameters.description: The API version to use for the operation.

200.description: OK - Returns an array of built in policy set definitions.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

get.summary: Retrieves a built in policy set definition.
get.description: This operation retrieves the built-in policy set definition with the given name.

parameters.name: policySetDefinitionName
parameters.description: The name of the policy set definition to get.

parameters.name: api-version
parameters.description: The API version to use for the operation.

200.description: OK - Returns information about the built in policy set definition.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

get.summary: Retrieves all policy set definitions in management group.
get.description: This operation retrieves a list of all the a policy set definition in the given management group.

parameters.name: api-version
parameters.description: The API version to use for the operation.

parameters.name: managementGroupId
parameters.description: The ID of the management group.

200.description: OK - Returns an array of policy set definitions.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

get.description: This operation retrieves the policy set definition in the given management group with the given name.

parameters.name: policySetDefinitionName
parameters.description: The name of the policy set definition to get.

parameters.name: api-version
parameters.description: The API version to use for the operation.

parameters.name: managementGroupId
parameters.description: The ID of the management group.

200.description: OK - Returns information about the policy set definition.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

put.summary: Creates or updates a policy set definition.
put.description: This operation creates or updates a policy set definition in the given management group with the given name.

parameters.name: policySetDefinitionName
parameters.description: The name of the policy set definition to create.

parameters.name: api-version
parameters.description: The API version to use for the operation.

parameters.name: managementGroupId
parameters.description: The ID of the management group.

200.description: OK - Returns information about the policy set definition.

201.description: Created - Returns information about the policy set definition.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

delete.description: This operation deletes the policy set definition in the given management group with the given name.

parameters.name: policySetDefinitionName
parameters.description: The name of the policy set definition to delete.

parameters.name: api-version
parameters.description: The API version to use for the operation.

parameters.name: managementGroupId
parameters.description: The ID of the management group.

204.description: No Content - the policy set definition doesn't exist in the subscription.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

get.summary: Retrieves the policy set definitions for a subscription.
get.description: This operation retrieves a list of all the policy set definitions in the given subscription.

parameters.name: api-version
parameters.description: The API version to use for the operation.

parameters.name: subscriptionId
parameters.description: The ID of the target subscription.

200.description: OK - Returns an array of policy set definitions.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

get.description: This operation retrieves the policy set definition in the given subscription with the given name.

parameters.name: policySetDefinitionName
parameters.description: The name of the policy set definition to get.

parameters.name: api-version
parameters.description: The API version to use for the operation.

parameters.name: subscriptionId
parameters.description: The ID of the target subscription.

200.description: OK - Returns information about the policy set definition.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

put.summary: Creates or updates a policy set definition.
put.description: This operation creates or updates a policy set definition in the given subscription with the given name.

parameters.name: policySetDefinitionName
parameters.description: The name of the policy set definition to create.

parameters.name: api-version
parameters.description: The API version to use for the operation.

parameters.name: subscriptionId
parameters.description: The ID of the target subscription.

200.description: OK - Returns information about the policy set definition.

201.description: Created - Returns information about the policy set definition.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

delete.description: This operation deletes the policy set definition in the given subscription with the given name.

parameters.name: policySetDefinitionName
parameters.description: The name of the policy set definition to delete.

parameters.name: api-version
parameters.description: The API version to use for the operation.

parameters.name: subscriptionId
parameters.description: The ID of the target subscription.

204.description: No Content - the policy set definition doesn't exist in the subscription.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

errorMessage.description: Error message indicating why the operation failed.

ErrorResponse.description: Error response indicates Azure Resource Manager is not able to process the incoming request. The reason is provided in the error message.

parameters.description: Required if a parameter is used in policy rule.

policyDefinitionId.description: The ID of the policy definition or policy set definition.

id.description: The ID of the policy set definition.

name.description: The name of the policy set definition.

nextLink.description: The URL to use for getting the next set of results.

value.description: An array of policy set definitions.

displayName.description: The display name of the policy set definition.

parameters.description: The policy set definition parameters that can be used in policy definition references.

policyDefinitions.description: An array of policy definition references.

policyType.description: The type of policy definition. Possible values are NotSpecified, BuiltIn, and Custom.

ApiVersionParameter.name: api-version
ApiVersionParameter.description: The API version to use for the operation.

ManagementGroupIdParameter.name: managementGroupId
ManagementGroupIdParameter.description: The ID of the management group.

SubscriptionIdParameter.name: subscriptionId
SubscriptionIdParameter.description: The ID of the target subscription.
